summary.para: The DXGI_OUTDUPL_POINTER_POSITION structure describes the position of the hardware cursor.

remarks.para: The Position member is valid only if the Visible member’s value is set to TRUE.

summary.para: The position of the hardware cursor relative to the top-left of the adapter output.
Specifies whether the hardware cursor is visible. TRUE if visible; otherwise, FALSE. If the hardware cursor is not visible, the calling application does not display the cursor in the client.
